captions.text:
Hey, rod.
Thanks for the ride...

Dave, what happened
to your eye?
Well, I got off work early.

<i>"I've got this acid,</i>
<i>but I can't do it."</i>

<i>So, I decided to get</i>
<i>on my bench grinder</i>

<i>And a piece of metal flew up</i>
<i>and hit me right in the eye.</i>
And that brings us to now.

Yeah, well,
just try and relax.

I'm gonna be
honest with you, rod.

You look like a giant eagle
with fire all around you

And you've got
a mountain for a face.

I'm guessing
that's the drugs, dave.

Yeah, but it's also
just kind of weird

Man, we just ran over
a small bus.

This really small bus,
we just ran over it.

title: Hot Rod (6/10) Movie CLIP - Trippin' Balls (2007) HD
